product_name: Arbor Pipe Board Shorts - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The quick-drying Arbor Pipe Board Shorts are perfect for those warm summer days when you're in and out of the water all day long. Bamboo-infused polyester blend offers UPF 50+ sun protection. Arbor Pipe Board Shorts have a flat waistband with lace-up closure and rip-and-stick tab; zippered pocket on the ride side. Closeout.
short_description: The quick-drying Arbor Pipe Board Shorts are perfect for those warm summer days when you're in and out of the water all day long.
